reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection of Personal Information by CheckingIn.
reply.reference: In this policy, we explain what Personal Information we collect from Users, and how we use, share, and manage it. For the purposes of this policy “User” means, as the case may be, any user of CheckingIn’s Apps... This policy is intended to establish responsible and transparent practices for the management of Personal Information... URL: https://www.checkingin.co/privacy-policy/

1. Scope & Interpretation
This Privacy Policy (the “policy”) applies to CheckingIn Software Ltd. (“CheckingIn”), its affiliates and to websites and computer applications running on mobile devices (“Apps”) operated by CheckingIn and such affiliates and subsidiaries. All references in this policy to “CheckingIn” and to “us”, “we”, or “our” refer to all or any of the foregoing.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use. The privacy policy mentions that the purpose for which Personal Information will be used is typically identified at or before the time the Personal Information is collected, and the use of Personal Information is limited to the purposes described in the policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app identifies the purpose for which Personal Information will be used, and the use of Personal Information is restricted to the purposes specified in the policy.
reply.reference: We identify the purpose for which Personal Information will be used typically at or before the time the Personal Information is collected. Our use of Personal Information is limited to the purposes described in this policy. URL: https://www.checkingin.co/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the ability to delete or disable certain technologies such as cookies at any time through their browser. This indicates that users can opt-out of data collection.

Unless permitted or required by law, CheckingIn will not collect, use or share Personal Information without first obtaining consent. We will obtain consent when we want to use Personal Information for a new purpose or for a purpose other than those stated at the time of collection, in this policy or in the terms and conditions of a specific product, service, program, contest, promotion or event you signed up for, participated in or purchased.

We actively retain Personal Information only as long as it is required for our relationship and a certain period of time afterwards to respond to queries or as required by federal and provincial laws. When this period ends, Personal Information is scheduled for destruction according to our record retention policies. Depending on the nature of the Personal Information and the purpose for which it was collected, this schedule may vary.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares Personal Information about users with other organizations outside of CheckingIn to provide products, services, programs, promotions, or help with business operations. This sharing includes sub-contractors, third party service providers, and other organizations that assist in improving products and services. However, the app limits the use of Personal Information and requires appropriate safeguards for protection.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app may share Personal Information with external organizations to support various aspects of its business, ensuring limitations on use and protective measures.
reply.reference: We may share Personal Information about you with other organizations outside of CheckingIn that help CheckingIn provide products, services, programs, promotions, contests or events or help us with our business operations. These other organizations may include sub-contractors, third party service providers, third parties that offer products, services, programs, promotions, contests or events under one of our brands, or organizations that help us improve our products, services, programs, promotions, contests or events as well as our business and technology systems, procedures and infrastructure. When CheckingIn shares Personal Information with any such party, we limit the use of such Personal Information to tho... URL: https://www.checkingin.co/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with sub-contractors, third party service providers, third parties offering products or services, and organizations assisting in improving products, services, programs, promotions, contests, events, and business operations.
